body.p: All PIs may have a limited lifespan. You can specify the first and last date for the PI to be used. This is controlled by two parameters that are not documented for each PI.

tr.td: The first day this PI will be used in a build process.
The last day this PI will be used in a build process

body.p: The form of the attributes are: yyyy:mm:dd. You may use one, both or none. If neither is present, the element is valid at all times.
